snippet: Markets closed mostly lower after a report showing a healthy United States services sector led investors to conclude the Federal Reserve would start reducing its stimulus sooner than anticipated.
abstract: Stock market lacks direction as Dow Jones industrial average and Standard & Poor's 500-stock index pull further back from their recent highs.
lead_paragraph: Markets closed mostly lower after a report showing a healthy United States services sector led investors to conclude the Federal Reserve would start reducing its stimulus sooner than anticipated.

headline.main: Market Takes a Breather After Recent Gains
headline.print_headline: Market Takes a Breather After Recent Gains
